mapper.select: select id, IFNULL(title, '') AS title, IFNULL(contents, '') AS contents, author, modifiedDate from posts where id = #{id}
select id, IFNULL(title, '') AS title, IFNULL(contents, '') AS contents, author, modifiedDate from posts
mapper.insert: insert into posts values (#{id}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{author}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
